item.description:
Please join us for a fall event and learn how to create new garden beds with minimal effort that will be ready to plant when spring arrives by using sheet mulch!

Sheet mulching is a no-till method that uses vegetal material, cardboard/paper along with a few additional amendments to create rich planting beds. Winter and early spring allow time for eager soil organisms to do the bulk of the work once we set up the right conditions for them.

The loose agenda:
12:00- Meet and greet
12:15- View the soil in earlier beds and discuss what worked well and what didn't
12:45- Start assembling a new sheet mulch bed
2:30ish- Wrap up and share a snack

Please bring:
Appropriate footwear for a mixed garden terrain
Questions applicable to your garden situation
A snack to share with the group

The $2 fee is to help cover meetup costs.
item.name: Sheet Mulch Garden Beds
